item.question: All of these open-guitar tunings were used on Soundgarden's 1994 smash album Superunknown EXCEPT:
Roy Buchanan is often credited as being the first guitar player to do this:

answers.answer: Pinch/Pick the strings to produce artificial harmonics
Play in the key of Eb

item.question: Kaki King, Gabriela Quintero, and Michael Hedges are known for using this guitar technique in their playing:

answers.answer: Percussive slapping on the body of the guitar

item.question: Jazz/rhythm and blues guitarist who helped develop early rock and and roll and wrote "method books" that have been in print for more than 50 years:
